definitions: The distance from the top or surface to the bottom of something.
The distance from the front to the back of something.
The distance from the top or surface of something to a specified lower point within it.
The apparent existence of three dimensions in a picture or other two-dimensional representation.
The quality of being intense or extreme.
Extensive and detailed study or knowledge.
A point far below the surface.
A time considered to be the worst point within a bad period.
A time when one's negative feelings are at their most intense.
